short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CMExpress Extension allow user to quick add item to CMExpress Courier Helper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allow users to easily add parcel into website just a simple click from Taobao. Yes, just one click.

CMExpress is a China Cross Border Logistic Expert in Malaysia and been serving logistic services for customer for years. Now, it is time to digitalise the services instead of using papers and pens !

Freight Selection.
CMExpress provide two type of freight to ship your goods from Taobao which is Air Freight and Sea Fright.

Extra.
CMExpress support "A blink parcel adding" feature for goods that purchased from Taobao. Just click [添加包裹], it can grab the parcel detail and add into the website

Contact Us at
Customer Service: support@cmexpress.my
